documentation.text: @notice Emitted when an operator is not allowed.
@dev The upgradeable initialize function that should be called when the contract is being upgraded.
@dev A helper modifier to check if the operator is allowed.
@dev A helper modifier to check if the operator approval is allowed.
@dev A helper function to check if the operator is allowed.

devdoc.details: This smart contract is meant to be inherited by token contracts so they can use the following:         - `onlyAllowedOperator` modifier for `transferFrom` and `safeTransferFrom` methods.         - `onlyAllowedOperatorApproval` modifier for `approve` and `setApprovalForAll` methods.
devdoc.title: OperatorFiltererUpgradeable

OperatorNotAllowed(address).notice: Emitted when an operator is not allowed.

userdoc.notice: Abstract contract whose constructor automatically registers and optionally subscribes to or copies another         registrant's entries in the OperatorFilterRegistry when the init function is called.
